UZI_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

Tactics.help: This Thugs Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good Leadership in Tactics from your Lieutenant.
Tactics.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Equipped.help: This Enforcer has been Equipped. He now has Dual 9mm UZIs. He can also increase the Damage of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Tactics.
